item.description:
The plan:  Park at Camp Winnekeag parking lot.  We will hike south on the Mid-State Trail approximately 1.14 miles to Mt Hunger on a woods trail, by a small glacial erratic, tiny brook, steep slope and an unique tilted rectangular rock to a high point with a great view looking north to Stodge Meadow Pond and Mt Watatic.  We will then re-trace our steps back to the parking lot. Option: Continue north on the Mid State to Blueberry Hill and Fisher Hill. approximately 1.34 miles one way.  Total for all would be around 5 miles. Your choice if you want to just do Mt Hunger or Fisher and Blueberry, too!  Guesstimating time to be 3 hours for all.

Watatic Mt and Stodge Meadow Pond

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Mid-State Trail to Mt Hunger 1,447' plus Blueberry Hill 1,473' & Fisher 1,548'
